short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension includes several trading calculators for our clients and affiliates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At HotForex we believe that in order to get the best performance from our affiliates and partners in general, we should provide them innovating marketing tools to target Novice and Expert traders alike. Our wide variety of promotional marketing material will guarantee to boost your affiliate program commissions.

In line with the above we are happy to announce the release of our HotForexTools Google Chrome extension

This extension provides the following trading calculators:

-Fibonnaci 
-Pivot Points 
-Pip Value
-Position Size 
-Risk and Reward

By HotForex.
www.hotforex.com
